SEARCH
Package edu.core.billingmanagement

Class PaymentInfo

java.lang.Object
edu.core.billingmanagement.PaymentInfo
public class PaymentInfo extends Object
Represents payment information associated with a user or transaction. This class provides attributes to store credit/debit card details like card number, expiry details, card type, etc., and offers methods to get and set these attributes.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static enum 
    PaymentInfo.PaymentType
    Enumeration representing the type of payment - CREDIT_CARD or DEBIT_CARD.

      public PaymentInfo(PaymentInfo.PaymentType paymentType, String cardholderName, String cardNumber, int expiryMonth, int expiryYear, String cardType)
      Constructs a new PaymentInfo object with the given details.
      Parameters:
      paymentType - The type of payment - CREDIT_CARD or DEBIT_CARD.
      cardholderName - The name of the card holder.
      cardNumber - The card number
      expiryMonth - The expiration month of the card.
      expiryYear - The expiration year of the card.
      cardType - The type of the card (e.g., Visa, MasterCard, etc.).
